metadata.title: AKS Configmap Modified
metadata.description: Detects modification of configmaps which may contain sensitive configuration.

properties.description: Detects when sensitive ConfigMaps are modified, which may indicate configuration tampering.
properties.query:
let SensitiveConfigMaps = dynamic(["aws-auth", "kube-proxy", "coredns", "azure-ip-masq-agent-config"]);
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend user = log.user
| extend sourceIPs = log.sourceIPs
| extend responseStatus = log.responseStatus
| where objectRef.resource == "configmaps"
| where verb in ("update", "patch", "delete")
| where responseStatus.code in (200, 201, 204)
| extend
    ConfigMapName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    SourceIP = tostring(sourceIPs[0]),
    Verb = verb,
    ClusterName = Resource
| where ConfigMapName in (SensitiveConfigMaps) or Namespace == "kube-system"
| where not(Username startswith "system:")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    ConfigMapName,
    Verb,
    Username,
    SourceIP
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    ModificationCount = count(),
    Verbs = make_set(Verb, 5)
    by ClusterName, Namespace, ConfigMapName, Username, SourceIP

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Sensitive ConfigMap '{{ConfigMapName}}' in namespace '{{Namespace}}' was modified by '{{Username}}'.
